title: The directional light source simulator representation should be affected by <pose> <direction> or both.

content.raw:
In the simulator a directional light source appears as a green square with a line pointing down. The xyz position of this square changes if you modify the <pose> values, however the rpy values do not seem to be reflected by the square.

Neither does changing the values of the <direction> element change the direction the green square points.

Judging from Koenig's answer here (http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/7788/can-the-directional-light-source-simulator/) the desired behavior is for the <direction> tag to alter the orientation of the line.

The docs should also be updated to note that the rpy component of a <pose> element on a directional light are ignored.
